::Drillbitt::


A one bot, transport ship lands outside Megatron's base.
The DNA scanner does it's job.
The cockpit opens, and a Transformer steps out.
He wears the Predicon symbol.
"Beast mode!" He tranformes to his beetle mode, and goest to the
enterance.
"Drillbitt, TERRORIZE!" He turns back to bot mode.
"Hello? I have come to join you."
